snippet: The health care system squanders $750 billion a year through unneeded care, byzantine paperwork, fraud and other waste, the Institute of Medicine said Thursday.
abstract: Institute of Medicine report shows that the American health care system squanders $750 billion a year, 30 cents of every medical dollar, through unneeded care, byzantine paperwork, fraud and other waste.
lead_paragraph: The health care system squanders $750 billion a year through unneeded care, byzantine paperwork, fraud and other waste, the Institute of Medicine said Thursday.
